item.title: Item id's interface
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

ok, ive tried to add my own interface for my client only items that i made and this is the code ive got

public void ItemId(){ sendFrame126("@dre@client items list", 8144; clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("@dre@7644 - Zamorak Godsword", 8145; sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }
the command that goes with that is

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("itemid") && (playerRights >= 1)) { ItemId(); }

when i tried to compile i got this error.

client.java:7683: ')' expected sendFrame126("@dre@client items list", 8144; ^
and i got a 2 other errors similar to that.

Read full topic
